faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answer all your questions about Disney style conversion

items.question: What image formats are supported?
items.answer: We support common image formats like JPG, PNG, GIF, with file size not exceeding 20MB.

items.question: How long does the conversion take?
items.answer: Image conversion usually takes 10-30 seconds, video conversion may take 1-5 minutes depending on length.

items.question: Can the generated images be used commercially?
items.answer: Basic version users can only use generated images for personal use, commercial version users can use them for commercial purposes.

items.question: How to cancel subscription?
items.answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime in account settings. After cancellation, you can still use it until the end of the current billing cycle.
